plugins.name: Indent
plugins.description: Implements the core of the indent feature. It requires compatible plugins, such as indent block or list, to work.

plugins.name: Indent block
plugins.description: The indent block feature, together with the indent feature, controls the indentation of elements such as paragraphs and headings.

htmlOutput._comment: By default, the plugin uses inline styles for indentation.
If classes are defined in `config.indentBlock.classes`, they are used instead of inline styles.
